projects: [{"title":"AlterKGP","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Present","description":"• Created a social media website aimed to provide curated content and notifications related to the institute's student activities at one place• Deployed website uses MERN stack with REST Architecture of API having CRUD functionality and hosted on a custom domain• Supporting the web app is Alter2.2, a chrome extension that helps access Alter-KGP within Facebook"},{"title":"Assisted History Matching from Production Data using MRST","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"May 2021"},{"title":"Radon Flux Prediction using Discrete Fracture Network Model, Jadugoda","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"• Completed MSc. dissertation under Prof. Debashish Sengupta on predicting radon flux using a stochastic DFN model• The radon flux predicted by the generated fracture network for Jadugoda uranium mines, Jharkhand was within an acceptable error limit <5 %"}]

organizations.title: American Association of Petroleum Geologists (AAPG)
organizations.description: • Founding member of the chapter leading a 3-tier team for more than a year, having served as Vice-President earlier• Organized 2 major events and a webinar overseeing a combined participation of 250+ researchers and educators • Took up the registered members count from 10 to over 50 members during the tenure; garnered a reach of 1000+ on social media

organizations.title: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
organizations.membership_type: General Secretary, Social and Cultural Activities, HJB Hall of Residence
organizations.description: • Fostered participation from HJB Hall of Residence; oversaw logistical needs of 80+ students in competitions; managed a budget of 150k• Led a team of more than 50 to create our hall's Illumination and Rangoli, a prestigious event indigenous to the institute

organizations.title: AIESEC
organizations.description: • Led a team of 10; created projects & hosted 20+ international volunteers across NGOs in 3 different towns in projects related to UNs SDG• Responsible for organizing talks and events in the annual symposium, YouthSpeak Forum, which oversaw a participation of more than 300
